attributes.action: Keep the meals on wheels service in operation in Havering.
attributes.background: My Father is 93 years old and suffers with dementia.  His meals on wheels are a lifeline, he really   looks forward to them and the people who deliver them. (He has to pay) Government cut backs mean they have to stop.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Meals on wheels services are run by local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

We could accept a petition calling on the UK Government to provide funding specifically to support meals on wheels services across the country.
